content:
Hi there! My name is Eric Masiello. I’m a web developer and designer from the DC area specializing in front-end development. I focus on small to medium sized web apps using frameworks such as React, Angular JS, and Knockout and websites built on top of WordPress. I also build mobile apps using React Native.

If you’re interested in knowing more about me, download my resume or contact me via LinkedIn.

And for my fellow nerds out there, this very site was built using two different frameworks. One version was built with React and Redux (view source code) and another with Angular JS (view source code). Both versions of the site are backed by the same back-end built on top of Wordpress and the WordPress WP Rest API. The source code for both versions are available on my Github account.
